Name: Siege of the Swine
About the game: Defend your castle from a never-ending siege of pig people, searching for your new high score. The pigs never end. The king never wins. Siege of the Swine is an action platformer that tells the story of a kingdom under siege by a horde of mutant pig-people. As the last remaining member of your kingdom, defend the final arena before the kingdom inevitably falls.
